title: Viktor: Heart of Her King
description: Three millennia of life and loss have brought the Supreme Commander to this place…At this time…To meet the only woman who can save his soul...Nay, his very existence.Too many days pondering her life.Too many nights dreaming of the nameless, faceless man who makes her feel things she never thought possible.One has a chance for revenge...The other has a chance for redemption.Together, they must make a choice.Together, they hold the key.Together, as one, only they can save the heart of her King.
author: Julia Mills
